title: tiered wedding cake
description: This simple, yet beautiful wedding cake is perfect if you don’t have much experience making wedding cakes. I’ve given excessive quantities of marzipan and fondant icing, as it’s best to start with more than you need, especially for beginners. Equipment and preparation: For this cake you’ll need an 18cm round tin, 25cm round tin and respective thin cake boards and a cake smoother.  To assemble the cakes, you’ll need a 30cm/12in cake drum, 4 dowelling rods, a 12cm/4½in thin cake board and a 12cm/4½in polystyrene cake spacer. All of these are available from specialist cake shops.
ingredients: 175g/6oz glacé cherries or more dried fruit
brandy, whisky or orange juice, to finish
350g/12oz glacé cherries or more dried fruit
brandy, whisky or orange juice, to finish
ribbons, fresh flowers or fondant flowers, to decorate
